argumentText:

i j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | decpmate.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |

| 3 |  | decpmate.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |

| 5 |  | decpmatcl.d | |- D = ( Base ` A ) |
| 6 | 2, 3 | #P_decpmatval | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |

| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( M e. B -> N e. Fin ) |

| 18 | 2, 13, 3, 14, 15, 17 | #P_matecld | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> ( i M j ) e. ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> K e. NN0 ) |

| 22 | 21, 13, 1, 8 | #P_coe1fvalcl | |- ( ( ( i M j ) e. ( Base ` P ) /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 20, 22 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 24 | 4, 8, 5, 11, 12, 23 | #P_matbas2d | |- ( ( R e. V /\ M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) e. D ) |
